text: Vlasta Chramostová (17 November 1926 – 6 October 2019) was a Czech movie actress. She appeared in 35 movies from 1950 until her death. She starred in the 1950 movie The Trap which was entered into the 1951 Cannes Film Festival. She was born in Brno. Other movie roles include: The Secret of Blood (1953), The Cassandra Cat (1963), The Cremator (1969), Sekal Has to Die (1998) and Leaving (2011). Chramostová died in Brno on 6 October 2019 at the age of 92.Zemřela herečka Vlasta Chramostová ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech stage actors Category:People from Brno
title: Vlasta Chramostová
